channel.title: It Is The Nature Of Dreams To End: An Audio Narrative
channel.description: It Is The Nature Of Dreams To End: An Audio Narrative (otherwise known as Dreams) is a collaborative project between Lunar Light Studio and Reeder, featuring the vocal talents of Lillian Kraack and Reeder himself.
channel.itunes:author: Lunar Light Studio

item.title: It Is The Nature Of Dreams To End: An Audio Narrative
item.itunes:author: Lunar Light Studio
item.itunes:summary:
It Is The Nature Of Dreams To End: An Audio Narrative (otherwise known as Dreams) is a collaborative project between Lunar Light Studio and Reeder, featuring the vocal talents of Lillian Kraack and Reeder himself.
Script by Lillian Kraack
Music by "It Is The Nature Of Dreams To End" by Reeder Soundcloud - https://soundcloud.com/iamreeder/sets/it-is-the-nature-of-dreams-to-end Bandcamp - https://iamreeder.bandcamp.com/album/it-is-the-nature-of-dreams-to-end
Julia/Narrator - Lillian Kraack Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/lkraack Bandcamp: https://lkraack.bandcamp.com Tumblr: https://bluespacemusic.tumblr.com
Nocturne - Reeder Soundcloud: https://soundcloud.com/iamreeder Bandcamp: https://iamreeder.bandcamp.com/ Website: http://www.iamreeder.com/ Twitter: https://twitter.com/reeder_music
https://www.lunarlightstudio.com/
